column4: how do I change the screen resolution? there is no System, Preferences, Screen Resolution
You may have to log out, or even reboot, to force it to double-check.
Test Compiz first, if you feel like it.
If Compiz works, games almost certainly will.
You don't buy those! Those are GPLed games! :)
Take a look at the Linux game library when you get the chance, there's tons of great stuff. :)
